alert.note: Alert for Ashley; Chicot (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 07 at 7:27PM CST until January 07 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CST FOR SOUTHWESTERN CHICOT AND SOUTHEASTERN ASHLEY COUNTIES... NORTHEASTERN MOREHOUSE...NORTH CENTRAL EAST CARROLL AND NORTHEASTERN WEST CARROLL PARISHES... At 727 PM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Wilmot, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Eudora around 815 PM CST. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Kilbourne. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
